Name: Parallèle 45 Côtes du Rhône Rouge Bio
Wine Description: It is bright, strong red colour. It is red fruits, spices. Palate: round tannins, spicy finish.

Name: Nicasia Vineyards Red Blend Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: Elegant nose with Cabernet Franc traces of herbs and anise, laced with Petit Verdot and Merlot intense dark fruit and spice fragances. Barrel aging provides further complexity with delicate smoke and toast flavors. This full-bodied wine is ideal with beef, mushroom risotto and complex, flavorful dishes.

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)

Name: Alter Ego de Château Palmer
Wine Description: Alter Ego is a spontaneous uninhibited wine, soft and round as soon as it has finished barrel ageing. Its lush aromas and supple tannins make it a wine that can be appreciated in the first years after bottling. Finesse and elegance, aromatic richness, harmony and length.

Name: Vigneto Monte Sant'Urbano Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The first sip of this wine brings to mind the sense of luxury. Lush, full, round, elegant-with a subversively long finish, it has in body as much to offer as the enigmatic aromas.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pessac-Léognan Rouge
Wine Description: The attack is supple and fruity. Spicy, tobacco, tar or even find themselves in the final. This wine has a nice tannic structure and richness is typical of wines from Pessac-Léognan. The wooded, well controlled, provides additional structure to this wine that we take pleasure to drink now, but that we can also afford to wait a few years.

Name: Austin Hope Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon is a highly regarded wine originating from California's Paso Robles region. Crafted by Austin Hope, a prominent winemaker and owner of Hope Family Wines, this Cabernet Sauvignon has earned a stellar reputation within the world of wine. Paso Robles, known for its diverse terroir and microclimates, provides an ideal setting for producing exceptional Cabernet Sauvignon. This wine primarily consists of Cabernet Sauvignon grapes, renowned for their deep color, robust flavors, and potential for aging. The winemaking process is characterized by meticulous attention to detail. Grapes are hand-harvested and carefully sorted before undergoing fermentation in stainless steel tanks. The wine then ages in a combination of new and used French oak barrels, imparting complexity and structure. Austin Hope's Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon boasts a deep, inky hue and a rich aromatic profile. It is characterized by ripe dark fruit notes, including blackberry and plum, complemented by cassis, mocha, and subtle spice. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied experience with velvety tannins and a satisfying, enduring finish. Notably, this wine is appreciated for its aging potential. While it is enjoyable when young, it has the capacity to evolve and gain greater complexity and depth with several years of bottle aging, making it a prized choice among wine collectors. Austin Hope Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon has garnered numerous accolades and high ratings from wine critics, firmly establishing its status as a premier wine. Additionally, Hope Family Wines, including Austin Hope, is dedicated to sustainable and environmentally responsible winemaking practices, underscoring their commitment to preserving the land for future generations.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: We make highly concentrated wines of great finesse, elegance and minerality. This is the true signature and pedigree of the local soils, which makes Beaurenard wines suited to lengthy ageing. They can also be drunk young, to procure an intense, lush pleasure.

Name: La Chapelle de La Mission Haut-Brion Pessac-Léognan
Wine Description: This wine has a dense purple colour with meaty notes of camphor, black currant, sweet cherry and blackberry. It has a lush, opulent texture, and an admirable purity and length.

Name: Black Chicken Zinfandel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Deep ruby red, acquiring touches of garnet with age. Elegant, warm, spicy, with hints of black cherry, dried fruit, and prunes in particular. Round, velvety and smooth.

Name: Pessac-Léognan
Wine Description: Pepper notes of blackcurrant leaf, and a light menthol gives it a beautiful harmony, which will only be confirmed when it will taste an entry as a cream of porcini or a regional dish such as cassoulet or yet, why not, a beautiful tray of fresh cheese.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Very intense ruby red colour with garnet reflections. On the nose fresh scents of small red fruits, raspberry, redcurrant and wild roses that evolve into licorice and spice notes. In the mouth warm, elegant, persistent with a long finish and soft tannins.

Name: Jayson Red
Wine Description: Jayson Red features layers of black fruit - blackberry, black cherry and plum - with milk chocolate, baker's cocoa dust, tar and earth. It is dense in the mouth with big supple tannins and a lingering finish.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Guidalberto
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Fronsac
Wine Description: Deep scarlet red in colour. Developed on the nose with elegant aromas of undergrowth and fresh truffle. Full and mellow on the palate, with well-integrated silky tannins. A pleasant freshness on the finish, with a hint of liquorice. A well-balanced and fully developed wine with all the elegance and complexity.

Name: Tous Ensemble Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ih has aroma of layered with fresh red fruits, rose petal, and vanilla. The body is redolent of damson plums, red apple skin and bing cherries, with a silky texture and smooth tannins.

Name: Vigna San Francesco Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Deep ruby red color with garnet shades. Warm, ripe on the nose, intense and of great refinement. The taste is complex, smooth, full bodied, lots of cherry notes and plum.

Name: Le Carillon d’Angélus Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: Château Angélus has a second wine named Le Carillon d’Angélus. It was first made in 1987 and accounts for 20 to 30% of the estate’s total production, depending on the year. It is blended from varying proportions of Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon that are partly picked on unclassified plots with clayey limestone and clayey sandy limestone soils. The vines are cared for in exactly the same way as those used to make the main wine. The same attention is paid to detail and selection during the harvest and winemaking as for the main wine. It is also aged in barrels, but not for so long and only half the wood is new in order to suit the wine's specific requirements. Le Carillon d’Angélus therefore has its own identity and style. It is made to be kept for the mid-term and displays enjoyable fruit aromas of plum and sour cherry and has velvet-smooth tannins.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Joseph
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Lalande-de-Pomerol
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Ovello
Wine Description: Full Bodied wines with bright fruit matched by youthful tannins on the finish.

Name: Toro
Wine Description: Pintia is an elegant wine within the austerity of the region, i.e. delicate tannins embraced by the aroma of fresh fruit whilst avoiding overripeness and liquorice aromas.

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Rabajà
Wine Description: Complex and elegant, silky tannins and intense dark fruit on the finish.

Name: ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The heart of Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars is undoubtedly the estate vineyards and extraordinary care is taken to assure that a wine’s aroma, flavor, and texture convey a sense of place. As the difference between a good wine and a great one is often in the details, our viticultural practices are driven by extreme, even obsessive, attention to detail. Throughout the growing season and all the way through harvest, vines are cared for to achieve their optimum maturity level and ensure the ‘signature’ of the terroir is expressed to its fullest. The goal is to create wines of classic beauty — wines with balance, complexity and harmony. From the beginning, the Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars vision has been to create wines that speak to the place from which they come. These goals are realized in our three limited-production Estate-Grown Cabernet Sauvignons – CASK 23, S.L.V. and FAY—which are crafted from vineyards surrounding the winery. The same classic style of the Estate wines is also expressed in the Napa Valley Collection, which consists of three wines: AVETA Sauvignon Blanc; KARIA Chardonnay and ARTEMIS Cabernet Sauvignon.

Name: Pinot Noir Two Creeks Vineyards
Wine Description: Two Creeks Pinot Noir boasts fragrant red and black cherry, red raspberry, strawberry and rose petal aromas.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ruby red in colour, with a very intense, persistent nose and with red fruit notes. Warm, balanced flavour with velvet-smooth tannins. Long-lasting aroma.

Name: Palermo Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A voluminous complexion of deep garnet and cardinal can be seen in the glass profile. Profoundly aromatic, the nose is treated to a decadent perfume of currant, roasted espresso, spring flowers, and toasty oak. Supple and rich in the mouth, intense flavors of wild berry fruit, plum, roasted fig, and cacao are in perfect alignment.

Name: Priorat
Wine Description: Bright red ruby colour. Damson fruit with hints of nutmeg, cinnamon and white pepper on the nose. This is a wine of great character with concentrated redcurrant and blackcurrant fruit, a soft texture and lingering finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: A lively rich ruby announces an equally appealing complexity in the bouquet, which has the classic essences of red berries, complemented by delicate nuances of oak and liquorice. On the palate this wine is warm and ample; showing a well integrated balance of tannins and acidity, a great structure and long, persistent finish.

Name: Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Morgon 'Cuvée Corcelette'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rioja Gran Reserva 904
Wine Description: Typical red colour, with brick tones on the edge of the glass. Medium robe, clear and brilliant. Long, penetrating and complex bouquet, with hints of spices, balsam and old leather against a background of ripe fruit. Well-structured to the palate, with silky, rich tannins, ending with some acidity so this wine will keep well. Excellent aftertaste, with persistent balsamic and spicy hints.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Colour: intense ruby red with garnet reflections. Bouquet: ethereal, wide, light vanilla. Taste: full, soft, velvety and intense, with sensations of liquorice, spices and light goudron note.

Name: Jayson Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: With its deep black core and garnet rim, this gorgeous Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon entices with aromas of black cherry, orange zest and a touch of dust. On the palate, layers of cherry, zest and dark cocoa powder coat the mouth while a hint of fresh pine provides an appealing zing. Rich and full-bodied, this wine’s tannins provide a reassuring grip underneath their supple, velvety mouthfeel – an indication of age-worthiness and promise of evolving complexity with years of additional cellaring.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Richly flavored and beautifully balanced, this vibrant wine offers a pure expression of Cabernet Sauvignon. Layers of black plum, white chocolate, vanilla and anise aromas leap from the glass, accented by an appealing hint of violets. On the palate, smoky plum, blackberry and supple leather flavors are supported by smooth yet substantial tannins.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Winery: Domaine de la Cote de l'Ange
Wine Description: Deep garnet with slightly brick red reflexes, smells of dried flowers, which merges with aromas of red fruit compote, smoke, game and spicy notes of pepper and cinnamon with a hint rum. A full-bodied wine with complex aromas and a long finish with notes reminiscent of wild and licorice.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ruby red color with garnet enveloping and intense nose, ethereal aroma with fruity notes soft and elegant mouth, the powerful body a gentle but important tannin.

Name: Faro

Name: Prado Enea Gran Reserva
Wine Description: Garnet colour with good robe and slight brick-red hues around the edge. In the nose aromas of spices and chocolate, wrapped up in fruit which is almost like a liqueur. A powerful attack in the mouth, balanced and yet syrupy smooth. With a very long and honest aftertaste.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: It has fabulous aromas of blackberry, dark chocolate and flowers follow through to a full-bodied palate, with super silky tannins and amazing richness and subtlety. Goes on for minutes on the palate.

Name: Pastourelle de Clerc Milon Pauillac
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Le Serre Nuove
Wine Description: Deeply colored, it presents warm red berry fruit, coca, and spice aromas. On the palate it's ample and round, with perfectly ripe, well polished tannins and rich fruit supported by perfectly balanced acidity.

Name: Rouge (Gaston Hochar)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Montestefano
Wine Description: Full bodied and tannic, dark and ripe fruit, thick on the palate, powerful finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has complex dark fruit notes of ripe black cherry, blackberry coulis and plum framed by dark chocolate, graphite, violets and a touch of incense smoke, balancing hedonistic fruit with tannic power.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromatics of plum, cherry, currants, coffee, cocoa and hints of allspice, fresh thyme, tobacco and forest floor. The body is laced with integrated tannins, great freshness and red fruit characteristics.

Name: Freestone-Occidental Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Fleurie
Wine Description: It contains beautiful and bright, just simpler than my previous bottle in October. I still love it and having it tonight with roast chicken raises the level of enjoyment.

Name: Savigny-les-Beaune Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Blason de L’Evangile Pomerol
Wine Description: Deep, clear colour with hints of violet. Fruity nose of red berries (raspberries and redcurrants) with notes of toast. On the palate, the attack is clean with a well-enveloped, balanced tannic structure. The texture is very velvety thanks to the ripe, well-coated tannins. The finish is fruity but it is the quality of the tannins that dominates.

Name: Pedestal Merlot
Wine Description: Curated by renowned Pomerol vintner Michel Rolland, Pedestal is an intense, fruit-forward wine, bursting with blueberries, plum, cedar and spice. Great concentration, integrated tannins and balanced acidity provide a long, layered finish.

Name: Clio
Wine Description: The wine exhibits a glass-coating opaque purple color with an expressive nose of pain grille, underbrush, brier, mineral, blueberry and blackberry .It is an opulent wine with great density, savory flavours and a lengthy finish.

Name: O.P.C Proprietary Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bandol Cuvée La Tourtine
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Morgon Côte du Py
Wine Description: Medium red color. Medium body, red cherries, delicious fresh juicy fruit, some earth. Great balance and finish.

Name: Barbaresco Riserva Asili
Wine Description: Color is brickish red, showing its age. Cedarbox and asian spice on the nose, earthy flavors with BIG dry tannins on finish along with dried cherries.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: A dark plum color, this wine opens with the scents of baking chocolate and fig, enhanced by notes of dried stone fruit, Christmas spice and wisps of Mesquite smoke. The palate is rich and supple, driven by dark berry flavors. Fresh earthiness and smoky notes rounded out with tannins that are leathery and smooth.

Name: Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Frederick
Wine Description: Packed with herbal characteristics and summer fruits such as cherries, strawberries, blackberries. The wine is rich with a firm texture. Tannins are abundant but soft and lingering on an impressively long finish.

Name: Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Under the purplish red colour, the nose is intense and complex. Enjoy this dry, full-bodied and woody red featuring refreshing acidity. On the palate, it showcases fleshy tannins and a broad mouthfeel that leads into a long finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Uriah
Wine Description: The nose is terroir driven with hints of wheat, basalt dust and herbal notes. The palate is very rich and soft with cherries, cassis, and pomegranates. The finish is long and velvety.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: A stunning example of this Southern Rhône blend with a smooth, earthy nose velvety texture and fruit-forward style; lovely, generous ripe black raspberry fruit and an exquisite finish.
